sentences.en: He sports a small red flower in his lapel.
sentences.cn: 他炫耀自己衣服翻领上的一朵小红花。

sentences.en: He supports the group and wears its pin on his lapel.
sentences.cn: 他支持这个团体，并在翻领上佩戴它的徽章。

sentences.en: Elizabeth absent-mindedly picked a thread from his lapel.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白心不在焉地从他的翻领上拈起了一根线。
